short_summary: Digital Signage Connectivity, Portal Access, Technical Support and Maintenance (InfoTV)
description: Request for Proposal for Digital Signage Connectivity, Portal Access, Technical Support and Maintenance (InfoTV). The successful bidder will provide digital signage connectivity, portal access, technical support and maintenance (InfoTV) to the Public Safety Canada (SP) for a period of one (1) year from the date of contract award. The contract may be extended for up to four (4) one (1) year periods. Evaluation will be based on a combination of technical merit (70%) and price (30%).
full_summary:
### Tender Notice

**Contract Reference Number**: cb-635-69328008

**Contract Title**: Digital Signage Connectivity, Portal Access, Technical Support and Maintenance (InfoTV)

**Solicitation Number**: 202400109; **Publication Date**: 2024-02-23; **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-25T14:00:00; **Amendment Date**: 2024-03-25

**Contract Period**: The contract period is for 1 year from the date of contract award, with the option to acquire services for up to four (4) one-year periods.

**Bid Evaluation Criteria**: The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit (70%) and price (30%).

**Trade Agreements**: This tender invokes the following trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement.

**Regions of Opportunity and Delivery**:
* Ontario (except NCR)
* Manitoba
* Nova Scotia
* Quebec (except NCR)
* Canada
* British Columbia
* National Capital Region (NCR)

**Security Requirements**: None identified.

**Contracting Entity**: Public Safety Canada
